title: PLEASE HELP, I upgraded to windows 10 now i get 2-10fps
body: I recently upgraded to windows 10 and now im only getting 2-10 fps in league which is unplayable, this shouldn't be happening I got a high end gaming pc, on windows 8.1 i was getting 200+ fps.... how do i fix this....

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried reinstalling your graphics drivers since the upgrade?
yeah I tried doing that today.
Have you installed any available windows updates?
no haven't installed any updates since the windows 10 yesterday
Install all available updates for Windows 10.
OMG its fixed, thank you so much :D.
i would honor you if i could :D
okay giving it a try now downloading the updates
it was having a problem before, it got stuck on 22 on downloading, but now its doing it.
